languages.text: {n}Горький смешок, вырвавшийся из уст меченого невольника, превращает ваши слова в утешение, произносимое над кроватью умирающего больного.{/n}
{n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Горький смешок, вырвавшийся из уст меченого невольника, превращает ваши слова в утешение, произносимое над кроватью умирающего больного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}

{n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个满脸伤疤的囚犯发出了苦笑声，让你的话听起来仿佛将死之人临终前会说的那种陈词滥调。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个满脸伤疤的囚犯发出了苦笑声，让你的话听起来仿佛将死之人临终前会说的那种陈词滥调。{/n}

languages.text: {n}印をつけられた囚人の唇から漏れる苦笑いが、あなたの言葉を死に際のありふれた言葉へと変えてしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}印をつけられた囚人の唇から漏れる苦笑いが、あなたの言葉を死に際のありふれた言葉へと変えてしまう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La amarga risotada del prisionero marcado convierte tus palabras en una monserga funeraria.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La amarga risotada del prisionero marcado convierte tus palabras en una monserga funeraria.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le rire amer qui s'échappe des lèvres du prisonnier marqué transforme vos belles paroles en platitudes funestes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire amer qui s'échappe des lèvres du prisonnier marqué transforme vos belles paroles en platitudes funestes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das bittere Kichern, das dem gebrandmarkten Gefangenen über die Lippen dringt, lässt deine Worte wie eine Plattitüde am Sterbebett klingen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The bitter chuckle that bursts from the lips of the marked prisoner turns your words into a deathbed platitude.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İşaretlenmiş mahkûmun dudaklarından dökülen acı gülüş, söylediğin sözlerin kulağa, ölüm yatağındaki birine söylenen yalanlarmış gibi gelmesine sebep oluyor.{/n}
